snippet: Tekmira Pharmaceuticals announced Friday that the trial of TKM-Ebola-Guinea had been stopped because it did not demonstrate a therapeutic benefit.
abstract: Tekmira Pharmaceuticals says experimental Ebola drug it has been developing, called TKM-Ebola-Guinea, has not worked on patients in Sierra Leone, dealing setback to what was considered promising new treatment.
lead_paragraph: Tekmira Pharmaceuticals announced Friday that the trial of TKM-Ebola-Guinea had been stopped because it did not demonstrate a therapeutic benefit.

headline.main: Clinical Trial of Experimental Ebola Drug Is Halted
headline.print_headline: Setback as Ebola Drug Trial Is Halted
